sections.title: Teeth whitening in Shoreham-by-Sea
sections.body: Dentist-led home whitening with UK-compliant gels, custom trays, and clear shade planning. We keep enamel safe while preparing your smile for wider cosmetic work such as alignment (/treatments/clear-aligners) or bonding (/treatments/composite-bonding).
bullets: Custom-fit trays made from digital scans
UK-appropriate gels prescribed and monitored by your dentist
Shade targets that respect your natural enamel and restorations
Planned as part of Align, Bleach, Composite smile design

sections.title: Digital records and lab-made trays
sections.body: We use calibrated photography, digital scans, and lab-made trays to keep gel placement accurate. Shade mapping documents progress and informs any adjustments to pacing or gel strength.

faqs.question: Is dentist-led whitening safe?
faqs.answer: Yes. We prescribe UK-compliant gels, design protective trays, and pace treatment so enamel stays healthy.

faqs.question: How long does treatment take?
faqs.answer: Most plans take a few weeks of at-home use with review points. Timing depends on your starting shade and goals.

faqs.question: Will whitening change crowns or veneers?
faqs.answer: Existing crowns, veneers, and fillings do not lighten. We plan around them and discuss refresh options if needed.
